page.title: 15HOW SUNDAY IS SPENT (2).
page.content: Then we went to Messing to interview some people there.The first person we interviewed in Messing told us what he does on a typical Sunday;he does some gardening and watches television. Then we asked him if he goes to Church but he doesn't.Then we asked him what he does in his spare time. He said he paints the outside of the house and he also enjoys gardening.The next person told us she cooks lunch,sometimes goes for a ride, or she goes to visit somebody.Then we asked her if she goes to church but she doesn't very often.We asked her what she does in her spare time.She does gardening or wall papering.The next lady we interviewed was quite interesting. On a Sunday she does some gardening and goes for a bike ride. At lunch time she goes to the pub.She told us that she does not go to church.
